App.name: App
App.description: The App class defines the main object of the applications

params.name: options
params.description:
An object defining options for the application.
* views - An array with a list of view names

m.name: m

Mootor.name: Mootor
Mootor.description:
Mootor public global object
Access modules and namespaces

View.name: View
View.description:
The View class handles each screen of the application. 
A list of views is specified in the applications options
and the files are loaded from the views/ folder.
Each view has a viewName.js and a viewName.html file.
The viewName.js file defines options for the view.

params.name: options
params.description:
An object defining options for the current view.
* constructor - A function that will be run after the view has loaded (optional).
* animation - a string defining the type of animation used to show this view (one of: "slide-left", "slide-right", "none").

View.author: Mart√≠n Szyszlican (martinsz [at] gmail.com)

classitems.description: Init views, load remote files and call the View class to handle it.
classitems.name: initViews

params.name: views
params.description: A list of view names to be initialized

classitems.description:
Stores the navigation history. 
An array of views, ordered in the sequence that they were visited by the user.
classitems.name: history

classitems.description:
Application settings
If called with a key, returns the value. If called with key and value, sets value to key.
classitems.name: settings

classitems.description: Create or get a view

params.name: settings
params.description: The settings object for the view

classitems.description: Go to a view
classitems.name: go

classitems.description: Go to the previous view in the history
classitems.name: back

classitems.description: Go to next view in the history
classitems.name: forward

classitems.description: Returns a router instance
classitems.name: router

Creates a new namespace
If the namespace is already created, it returns the namespace

classitems.description: Turn the given element into a panel: add moo-panel class, set options, transitoin and hide the panel.
classitems.name: init

params.name: options
params.description:
The options for the current panel
* transition - A string that specifies the type of transition used to show this panel (none, slide-left, slide-right)

return.description: Returns the same object it's applied to, to allow chaining.

classitems.description: Shows a panel using the specified transition
classitems.name: show

return.description: Returns the same object it's applied to, to allow chaining.

classitems.description: Hides a panel using the specified transition
classitems.name: hide

return.description: Returns the same object it's applied to, to allow chaining.

classitems.description: A reference to the UI representation of this view
classitems.name: ui

classitems.description:
Title is the friendly name for the current view.
When called without parameters, returns a string containing the title. When called with parameters, sets the title.
classitems.name: title

classitems.description:
Sets an event handler for the view
Possible values for event: load, beforeLoad, unload, beforeUnload, init
TODO: Define which parameters are passed to the callback function.
classitems.name: on

params.name: event
params.description: Defines in which event the handler will be called

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to be called when the event is fired.

classitems.description:
Unsets event handlers for the view
Possible values for event: load, beforeLoad, unload, beforeUnload, init
classitems.name: off

params.name: event
params.description: Defines in which event we want to unset handlers

params.name: callback
params.description: If this parameter is specified, only that function is removed. Otherwise all callbacks for this event are removed.

classitems.description: Removes the view from the app (and from the screen)
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: Inserts the view to the app
classitems.name: insert

classitems.description: Gets or sets the source for the HTML of this view.
classitems.name: html

classitems.description: Gets or sets the source for the JavaScript of this view.
classitems.name: script

classitems.description: Gets or sets the source for the CSS StyleSheet of this view.
classitems.name: css
